Reviews.Title: its a nice phone to use
Reviews.Author: Daniel Barnaby
Reviews.Content: I have this phone in July to December it was acting up I have a replacement phone it's the same phone

Reviews.Title: did not work
Reviews.Author: carol mccaskill
Reviews.Content: I got this phone and set it up. It worked fine for about a week and a half. Then it just quit working altogether.
